text: That’s why we didn’t take #antimalarials for our 20 Years in malarial tropics 🏝. Advised not to take #Chloroquine daily ‘cos of eye issues. Bit experimental, when we got malaria we hit it with Fansidar, Daraprim, or Mefloquine/Lariam in mega doses till they halved it for safety. https://t.co/dsoPwjRztp
